thread.title: AfterMaster To Master Vinyl Record Set For Prolific Singer
thread.title_full: AfterMaster To Master Vinyl Record Set For Prolific Singer

author: AfterMaster, Inc.
title: AfterMaster To Master Vinyl Record Set For Prolific Singer
text:
HOLLYWOOD, Calif. , Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- AfterMaster, Inc. (OTCQB: AFTM), an industry leading audio technology company today announced that it will release the first ever mastered vinyl set of legendary singer, songwriter and music producer Jim Messina , with special guest Rusty Young . The highly anticipated record launch was spurred from Messina's September performance, "An Evening With Jim Messina," the concert where AfterMaster provided AfterMaster HD mastering audio processing live and in real time. This was the first time that a live concert had been mastered as it was broadcasted. "We were thrilled to AfterMaster Messina's vinyl record due to the incredible feedback received from the mastered live concert," said Paul Wolff , Senior Engineer and Director of Product Development for AfterMaster. "We were told by industry leaders from around the globe that the sound quality of the live concert was analogous to an in-studio recording."
Top producers around the globe have trusted AfterMaster's innovation and state of the art technology when working with some of today's most prominent artists. AfterMaster's technology enhances the quality of any track without compromise throughout the entire frequency range and is the only real-time audio enhancement process available for professional music mastering. Creating mastering history with Messina, AfterMaster utilized the company's groundbreaking audio by mixing each song live, delivering unbelievable sound that would rival any in-studio recording. 
"AfterMaster's technology is a game-changer for our industry," said Dave Jenkins , owner of California Streamin' which streamed the show. "I was thoroughly impressed with how AfterMaster enhanced the sound of Messina's live concert. The difference in a mastered live concert was apparent and I will definitely be using AfterMaster for all my future shows." 
Deeply rooted in the industry, the AfterMaster team continues to support, collaborate and create with artists worldwide. Staying true to their DNA, AfterMaster experts not only mastered Messina's latest work but also are responsible for the engineering and mixing on the record set. 
To pre-order Messina's double vinyl record set, mastered by AfterMaster, please visit: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/jim-messina-live-special-vinyl-12-double-album/x/10017864#/story 
For more information, visit: http://www.aftermasterhd.com / http://promasterhd.com 
About AfterMaster 
AfterMaster (OTCQB: AFTM) is a groundbreaking audio technology originally developed for the mastering, re-mastering and processing of audio through AfterMaster HD Audio Labs, Inc. AfterMaster 's executive team includes music and audio technology leaders Justin Timberlake , Rodney "Darkchild" Jerkins, Shelly Yakus and Larry Ryckman . AfterMaster delivers an unparalleled clarity, depth and fullness to audio recordings, while delivering a significant increase in volume without increased distortion or loss of dynamic range. The technology has been utilized by a number of leading musicians seeking to create a fuller and richer sound quality than otherwise available in digital audio.
